Html:
Please I want to find a solution to control markers. I see in the tutorials 3D objects is not dependent markers it is alway the center of the page. I want to know how fair that every3D object will be displayed over a marker to specify a page that contains several markers
Please I need your help thank you

Sorry, but I don't quite understand your question

Ohan

Well, sir my project is an educational brochure(game for children between 3 and 5 years) with augmented reality contains about 3 pages, in the first page i want to do a puzzle game(simple image).

so, i have a problem with the detection of markers, you know of course in the puzzle game each piece of image must appears on a marker, and then the child must reacts with markers and make a correct picture.

the langage is C# , library GoblinXna 

I hope that you understand me now Mr Ohan, thanks.
